mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveEmployeeList */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , STD_NM AS "studentName" , GENDER AS "gender" , DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , POB AS "placeOfBirth" , POS_DESC AS "positionDesc" , BANK_ACC_NO AS "bankAccountNo" FROM FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE ORDER BY STD_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterTeacherQualificationHistory */ INTO FRST.TCH_QUF_HIS ( TCH_ID , SEQNO , QUAL_NM , QUAL_DESC , STRT_DT , END_DT , CERT_DT , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{teacherID} , #{seqNo} , COALESCE(#{qualificationName}, '') , COALESCE(#{qualificationDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{startDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{endDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{certificatedDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateEmployee */ FRST.TBL_EMPLOYEE SET STD_NM = COALESCE(#{studentName}, STD_NM) , GENDER = COALESCE(#{gender}, GENDER) , DOB = COALESCE(#{dateOfBirth}, DOB) , POB = COALESCE(#{placeOfBirth}, POB) , ADDRESS = COALESCE(#{address}, ADDRESS) , POS_DESC = COALESCE(#{positionDesc}, POS_DESC) , BANK_ACC_NO = COALESCE(#{bankAccountNo}, BANK_ACC_NO) WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID}
